trans-unit.source: Track B2B messages
trans-unit.target: Track B2B messages

trans-unit.source: This topic covers tracking of B2B processing
trans-unit.target: This topic covers tracking of B2B processing

trans-unit.source: Track B2B messages
trans-unit.target: Track B2B messages

trans-unit.source: B2B Tracking Information
trans-unit.target: B2B Tracking Information

trans-unit.source: B2B communication involves message processing between trading partners.
trans-unit.target: B2B communication involves message processing between trading partners.

trans-unit.source: The relationships are defined as agreements between two trading partners.
trans-unit.target: The relationships are defined as agreements between two trading partners.

trans-unit.source: Once the communication is established then there needs to be a way to monitor if the communication is happening as expected.
trans-unit.target: Once the communication is established then there needs to be a way to monitor if the communication is happening as expected.

trans-unit.source: As part of bringing B2B API Apps as part of Azure App Services we have enabled tracking data and the same is also surfaced via Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: As part of bringing B2B API Apps as part of Azure App Services we have enabled tracking data and the same is also surfaced via Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: AS2
trans-unit.target: AS2

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of an AS2 API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of an AS2 API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.

trans-unit.source: Herein one will be able to view all the AS2 tracking information and also filter it via the filter blades surfaced.
trans-unit.target: Herein one will be able to view all the AS2 tracking information and also filter it via the filter blades surfaced.

trans-unit.source: EDIFACT
trans-unit.target: EDIFACT

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of an EDIFACT API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of an EDIFACT API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.

trans-unit.source: Herein one will be able to view all the EDIFACT tracking information and also filter it via the filters surfaced.
trans-unit.target: Herein one will be able to view all the EDIFACT tracking information and also filter it via the filters surfaced.

trans-unit.source: Additionally one will be able to view the interchange level data, group level data and transaction set level data as one steps into the view.
trans-unit.target: Additionally one will be able to view the interchange level data, group level data and transaction set level data as one steps into the view.

trans-unit.source: If batches have been created as part of EDIFACT agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app then the Batching part will list all these batches.
trans-unit.target: If batches have been created as part of EDIFACT agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app then the Batching part will list all these batches.

trans-unit.source: One would be able to step into a batch to see the message which constitute the active message (if any) and also the information for batches which have completed in the past.
trans-unit.target: One would be able to step into a batch to see the message which constitute the active message (if any) and also the information for batches which have completed in the past.

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of a X12 API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of a X12 API App then browse to that instance and go to the Tracking part.

trans-unit.source: Herein one will be able to view all the X12 tracking information and also filter it via the filters surfaced.
trans-unit.target: Herein one will be able to view all the X12 tracking information and also filter it via the filters surfaced.

trans-unit.source: Additionally one will be able to view the interchange level data, group level data and transaction set level data as one steps into the view.
trans-unit.target: Additionally one will be able to view the interchange level data, group level data and transaction set level data as one steps into the view.

trans-unit.source: If batches have been created as part of X12 agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app then the Batching part will list all these batches.
trans-unit.target: If batches have been created as part of X12 agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app then the Batching part will list all these batches.

trans-unit.source: One would be able to step into a batch to see the message which constitute the active message (if any) and also the information for batches which have completed in the past.
trans-unit.target: One would be able to step into a batch to see the message which constitute the active message (if any) and also the information for batches which have completed in the past.

trans-unit.source: X12 & EDIFACT have similar tracking views.
trans-unit.target: X12 & EDIFACT have similar tracking views.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
